intro: Piptothrix, commonly known as the mountain holly or false holly, is a genus of flowering plants in the family Ericaceae. It consists of several species, primarily found in the temperate regions of the Northern Hemisphere. Piptothrix species are typically adapted to acidic soils and can thrive in shaded environments.
